Key Match Events: Despodov scored the only goal for Bulgaria in the 40th minute.
Ahmedov, Nurnberger, and Kolev received yellow cards for Bulgaria in the 78th, 90+1, and 90+3 minutes respectively.
Charles, McNair, Bradley, and Hume received yellow cards for Northern Ireland in the 28th, 29th, 59th, and 81st minutes respectively.
Pre-Game Insights: Bulgaria and Northern Ireland both made an unbeaten start to Group C3 of the UEFA Nations League.
Northern Ireland posted a victory over Luxembourg, while Bulgaria was held by Belarus.
Michael O'Neill has recorded four victories with clean sheets in Northern Ireland's last six outings.
Ilian Iliev, Bulgaria's national team boss, has yet to lose a match, recording six draws from seven matches.
